Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.roll

Class CourseRoll

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.roll.CourseRoll
public class CourseRoll extends Object
Represents the roll of a class. There is a maximum number of students allowed to enroll in a class, which is the enrollmentCap. The roll is a linked list that handles much of the functionality of adding/dropping students.
Author:
rdbryan2

    • setEnrollmentCap

      public void setEnrollmentCap(int enrollmentCap)
      Setter for enrollmentCap
      Parameters:
      enrollmentCap - the maximum number of students allowed to enroll in a class
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if enrollment cap is above the max enrollment or below the min enrollment cap. It is also thrown if enrollmentCap is null and if enrollementCap is less than the size of the roll.
